verses.text: \w My|strong="G1699"\w* friends, \w my|strong="G1699"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w*’s \w desire|strong="G2107"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w prayer|strong="G1162"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w my|strong="G1699"\w* \w people|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* \w salvation|strong="G4991"\w*.

\w I|strong="G1063"\w* \w can|strong="G1063"\w* \w testify|strong="G3140"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w they|strong="G3754"\w* \w are|strong="G3748"\w* \w zealous|strong="G2205"\w* \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w the|strong="G2596"\w* honour \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*; \w but|strong="G1063"\w* \w they|strong="G3754"\w* \w are|strong="G3748"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* guided \w by|strong="G2596"\w* \w true|strong="G1922"\w* insight,

\w for|strong="G1063"\w*, \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* ignorance \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* divine \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* eagerness \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w set|strong="G2476"\w* \w up|strong="G2476"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* \w own|strong="G2398"\w*, \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w refused|strong="G3756"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* accept \w with|strong="G2532"\w* submission \w the|strong="G2532"\w* divine \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w has|strong="G5547"\w* \w brought|strong="G1519"\w* \w Law|strong="G3551"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w an|strong="G1519"\w* \w end|strong="G5056"\w*, \w so|strong="G1519"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* \w may|strong="G5547"\w* \w be|strong="G3956"\w* obtained \w by|strong="G1519"\w* \w everyone|strong="G3956"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w believes|strong="G4100"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w* \w writes|strong="G1125"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w*, \w as|strong="G1722"\w* \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* results \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w Law|strong="G3551"\w*, \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w practice|strong="G4160"\w* \w it|strong="G3754"\w* \w will|strong="G4160"\w* find \w life|strong="G2198"\w* \w through|strong="G1722"\w* \w it|strong="G3754"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* results \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* finds expression \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* words: “\w Do|strong="G5101"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w yourself|strong="G4771"\w* ‘\w Who|strong="G5101"\w* \w will|strong="G5101"\w* \w go|strong="G1519"\w* \w up|strong="G1519"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*?’” (\w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w means|strong="G1510"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w bring|strong="G2609"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w down|strong="G2609"\w*)

“\w or|strong="G2228"\w* ‘\w Who|strong="G5101"\w* \w will|strong="G5101"\w* \w go|strong="G2597"\w* \w down|strong="G2597"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* depths below?’” (\w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w means|strong="G1510"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w bring|strong="G1519"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w up|strong="G1519"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*).

\w No|strong="G2532"\w*, \w but|strong="G2532"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w does|strong="G1510"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w*? “\w The|strong="G1722"\w* \w message|strong="G4487"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w near|strong="G1451"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w*, \w on|strong="G1722"\w* \w your|strong="G2532"\w* \w lips|strong="G4750"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w your|strong="G2532"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w*” (\w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w means|strong="G1510"\w* “\w The|strong="G1722"\w* \w message|strong="G4487"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*” \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w we|strong="G3739"\w* \w proclaim|strong="G2784"\w*).

\w For|strong="G3754"\w*, \w if|strong="G1437"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w your|strong="G2962"\w* \w lips|strong="G4750"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w acknowledge|strong="G3670"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* truth \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* message \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w JESUS|strong="G2424"\w* \w IS|strong="G3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="G2962"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w believe|strong="G4100"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w your|strong="G2962"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w raised|strong="G1453"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*, \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w will|strong="G2316"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w saved|strong="G4982"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w with|strong="G1519"\w* \w their|strong="G1519"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w* people \w believe|strong="G4100"\w* \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w so|strong="G1161"\w* attain \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w*, \w while|strong="G1161"\w* \w with|strong="G1519"\w* \w their|strong="G1519"\w* \w lips|strong="G4750"\w* \w they|strong="G1161"\w* \w make|strong="G1519"\w* \w their|strong="G1519"\w* profession \w of|strong="G1343"\w* \w faith|strong="G4100"\w* \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w so|strong="G1161"\w* find \w salvation|strong="G4991"\w*.

\w As|strong="G3004"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* passage \w of|strong="G1909"\w* \w scripture|strong="G1124"\w* \w says|strong="G3004"\w* – “\w No|strong="G3756"\w* \w one|strong="G3956"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w believes|strong="G4100"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w will|strong="G3956"\w* \w have|strong="G3956"\w* \w any|strong="G3956"\w* \w cause|strong="G3588"\w* \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w shame|strong="G2617"\w*.”

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w distinction|strong="G1293"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w made|strong="G3756"\w* \w between|strong="G5037"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jew|strong="G2453"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Greek|strong="G1672"\w*, \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w same|strong="G2532"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* bountiful \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* invoke \w him|strong="G3588"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w everyone|strong="G3956"\w* \w who|strong="G3739"\w* invokes \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w* \w of|strong="G3686"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w will|strong="G3739"\w* \w be|strong="G3956"\w* \w saved|strong="G4982"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w how|strong="G4459"\w*, \w it|strong="G1161"\w* \w may|strong="G1161"\w* \w be|strong="G3756"\w* \w asked|strong="G3767"\w*, \w are|strong="G3739"\w* \w they|strong="G1161"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* invoke \w one|strong="G3739"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w they|strong="G1161"\w* \w have|strong="G4100"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* learned \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w believe|strong="G4100"\w*? \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w how|strong="G4459"\w* \w are|strong="G3739"\w* \w they|strong="G1161"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w believe|strong="G4100"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w one|strong="G3739"\w* \w whose|strong="G3739"\w* words \w they|strong="G1161"\w* \w have|strong="G4100"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* heard? \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w how|strong="G4459"\w* \w are|strong="G3739"\w* \w they|strong="G1161"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* hear \w his|strong="G1519"\w* words \w unless|strong="G3756"\w* \w someone|strong="G3739"\w* proclaims \w him|strong="G3739"\w*?

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w how|strong="G4459"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w anyone|strong="G1437"\w* \w to|strong="G1161"\w* \w proclaim|strong="G2784"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w unless|strong="G1437"\w* \w they|strong="G1161"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w sent|strong="G1125"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w his|strong="G5613"\w* messengers? \w As|strong="G5613"\w* \w scripture|strong="G1125"\w* says – “\w How|strong="G4459"\w* \w beautiful|strong="G5611"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w feet|strong="G4228"\w* \w of|strong="G3588"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w bring|strong="G2097"\w* \w good|strong="G2097"\w* \w news|strong="G2097"\w*!”

Still, \w it|strong="G1063"\w* \w may|strong="G3956"\w* \w be|strong="G3756"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, \w everyone|strong="G3956"\w* \w did|strong="G5101"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w give|strong="G3004"\w* \w heed|strong="G5219"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w good|strong="G3956"\w* \w news|strong="G2098"\w*. \w No|strong="G3756"\w*, \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w Isaiah|strong="G2268"\w* asks – “\w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w who|strong="G5101"\w* \w has|strong="G2962"\w* \w believed|strong="G4100"\w* \w our|strong="G3956"\w* teaching?”

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w so|strong="G1161"\w* \w we|strong="G1161"\w* gather, \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w a|strong="G1161"\w* \w result|strong="G1537"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w teaching|strong="G4487"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G1537"\w* \w teaching|strong="G4487"\w* comes \w in|strong="G4102"\w* \w the|strong="G1537"\w* \w message|strong="G4487"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w But|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w ask|strong="G3004"\w* “\w Is|strong="G3588"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w* possible \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w people|strong="G3956"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w never|strong="G3756"\w* heard?” \w No|strong="G3756"\w*, \w indeed|strong="G2532"\w*, \w for|strong="G1519"\w* – “\w Their|strong="G2532"\w* voices \w spread|strong="G1831"\w* \w through|strong="G3004"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* \w message|strong="G4487"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w ends|strong="G4009"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w world|strong="G3625"\w*.”

\w But|strong="G3361"\w* again \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w ask|strong="G3004"\w* “\w Did|strong="G1097"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w the|strong="G1909"\w* \w people|strong="G1484"\w* \w of|strong="G1909"\w* \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w* \w understand|strong="G1097"\w*?” \w First|strong="G4413"\w* \w there|strong="G3004"\w* \w is|strong="G3756"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w*, \w who|strong="G3756"\w* \w says|strong="G3004"\w* – “\w I|strong="G1473"\w*, \w the|strong="G1909"\w* Lord, \w will|strong="G1473"\w* stir \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* rivalry \w with|strong="G1909"\w* \w a|strong="G1909"\w* \w nation|strong="G1484"\w* \w which|strong="G1484"\w* \w is|strong="G3756"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w nation|strong="G1484"\w*; \w against|strong="G1909"\w* \w an|strong="G1909"\w* undiscerning \w nation|strong="G1484"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w will|strong="G1473"\w* arouse \w your|strong="G1909"\w* \w anger|strong="G3949"\w*.”

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Isaiah|strong="G2268"\w* \w says|strong="G3004"\w* boldly – “\w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w seeking|strong="G2212"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w*; \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w made|strong="G1096"\w* \w myself|strong="G1473"\w* known \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* inquiring \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w*.”

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w says|strong="G3004"\w* – “\w All|strong="G3650"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w long|strong="G2250"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w stretched|strong="G1600"\w* \w out|strong="G2532"\w* \w my|strong="G1473"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* disobey \w and|strong="G2532"\w* contradict.”
